summary: The memorandum from Howard J. Ozborn, Director of Security, to the Deputy Director for Support, L. K. White, details proposed key assignments within the Office of Security for the summer of 1965. It includes personnel changes such as Mr. Arthur G. Sheridan replacing Mr. James P. O'Connell, Jr. in Okinawa, and Mr. James W. McCord, Jr. succeeding Mr. Sheridan as Chief of the Technical Division. Additionally, it outlines the planned promotion of Mr. O'Connell to a GS-16 position upon his return to Headquarters, with all assignments approved by L. K. White.
key_findings: Proposed key assignments within the Office of Security for the summer of 1965.
Mr. Arthur G. Sheridan to replace Mr. James P. O'Connell, Jr. in Okinawa.
Mr. James W. McCord, Jr. to replace Mr. Sheridan as Chief, Technical Division.
Planned promotion of Mr. O'Connell to a GS-16 position upon his return to Headquarters.
Approval of the assignments by Deputy Director for Support, L. K. White.
